content.raw:
Thank you for addressing all the comments. LGTM.

I just pushed a change on c005caa so that going back to the initial pose woks even when `<camera_pose>` is not given. You can test this by loading the `empty.sdf` world, opening the view angles plugin, and clicking on the home. Before that change, the camera would go to the world origin, which is a bit awkward.
